lemma fixes \<iota>\<^sub>m \<delta>\<^sub>m w q\<^sub>0 fixes x :: "'a" defines "\<rho> \<equiv> run\<^sub>t (\<Delta>\<^sub>\<times> \<delta>\<^sub>m) \<iota>\<^sub>m w" defines "\<rho>' \<equiv> run\<^sub>t (\<delta>\<^sub>m x) q\<^sub>0 w" assumes "\<iota>\<^sub>m x = Some q\<^sub>0" shows product_run_project: "\<downharpoonleft>\<^sub>x (\<rho> i) = \<rho>' i" and product_run_embed: "\<rho> i \<in> \<upharpoonleft>\<^sub>x (\<rho>' i)"
